attributes.action: ignore the petition against road pricing and act for the greater good of future generations and the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Excessive and habitual car use has gone unchallenged for many years. With the freedom to drive comes a responsibility to consider its impact. However, people are either oblivious to or chose to ignore the damaging consequences. Road pricing in conjunction with fuel tax is a viable method of creating a strong enough financial incentive to force people to consider alternative forms of transport. The levy should then be used to improve public transport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
